casebody.data:
BLUE RIDGE COMPANY, L.L.C.
v.
The TOWN OF PINEVILLE, North Carolina. No. 101P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Roy H. Michaux, Jr., John H. Carmichael, Charlotte, for Blue Ridge Co. Robin Tatum Currin, Andrew J. Petesch, Raleigh, for Town of Pineville. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 655 S.E.2d 843 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 24th day of March 2008 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of December 2008."
